#Text= Toph says : " Look , the Pangs and the Yum Soon Hans are waiting in there for us !

column1: #Text=I 'm going to have to tell them who did n't let me in .
#Text=" Guard says : " Step out of line please .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sir , I 'm sorry to bother you , but my cousin lost our invitations .
#Text=Do you think you could help us ?
#Text=Our family 's inside and I 'm sure they 're very worried .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " I am honored , please come with me .
